entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Hey asshole. Yeah, you. Approaching 130,000 deaths from Coronavirus here in the US. In case that number doesn't make an impact on you, that's how many dollars in hush money you paid to Stormy Daniels. These are our citizens dying. You think you can focus for five goddamn minutes?
